forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will transition to snow showers this afternoon. Morning high of 2C with temps falling to -5 to -3. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will transition to snow showers this afternoon. Morning high of 38F with temps falling to near 25. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then some snow showers after midnight. Low -7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then some snow showers after midnight. Low 21F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the morning. Decreasing cloudiness in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 25F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -2C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later in the day. High 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near -5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 24F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around -5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 26F with temps rising to near freezing. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -3C with temps rising to -1 to 1. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 19F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with a mix of rain and snow later in the day. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with a mix of rain and snow later in the day. High 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 17F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.
